item.title: About
item.description: Contact form Message Send Disclaimer Submitting the form means that you are sending personal information (name & email) to adrian.contact@kuguar.io. Kuguar I/O is the receiving party and data controller. We will only use this information for the purpose of establishing relationship leading to possibly signing a services contract and eventual delivery thereof. We are not going to use this email to subscribe you to mailing lists, newsletters or to send you unwanted advertisements.
